meanings.definition: A diagnostic test that uses X-rays to visualize the arteries.
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended an arteriogram to check my arteries.
meanings.sent2: The arteriograms showed a blockage in the artery.
meanings.sent3: During the arteriogram, I felt like a superhero getting my secret powers revealed.
meanings.sent4: The arteriograms were like a map of hidden rivers inside my body.
meanings.sent5: The arteriograms lit up the screen, revealing the intricate pathways of my arteries.

meanings.definition: The images produced by an arteriogram.
meanings.sent1: The arteriograms displayed a clear picture of the arteries.
meanings.sent2: I studied the arteriograms carefully to understand the blood flow.
meanings.sent3: The arteriograms looked like abstract art, with colorful lines and shapes.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a collection of arteriograms, each memory a different image.
meanings.sent5: The arteriograms captured the beauty of the body's intricate network of arteries.
